feed.title: Combined summary - mailing list to get news ONLY about new releases

entry.title: Combined summary - mailing list to get news ONLY about new releases
entry.summary: The user in this post is looking for an alternative option to the RSS subscription provided on the official Bitcoin website. They are specifically interested in a mailing list where they can receive notifications about new releases of the bitcoin-qt client. However, no such mailing list has been mentioned in the post, leaving the RSS subscription as the only option for staying updated.
